localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.title:
Traded emails w/someone this week who claimed an 8% annual return was far too low

They wanted way much higher

This is how bubbles form

Ppl see others getting rich and go further & further out on the risk curve

(doesn't mean it's not fun while it lasts)
nodes.author: Ben Carlson

localize.full_text:
本周与某人交换了电子邮件，他声称8%的年回报率太低了。

他们想要更高的价格

这就是气泡的形成过程

人们看到别人发财，就会在风险曲线上越走越远&。

趁热打铁

本週與某人交換了電子郵件，他聲稱8%的年回報率太低了。

他們想要更高的價格

這就是氣泡的形成過程

人們看到別人發財，就會在風險曲線上越走越遠&。

趁熱打鐵

nodes.title:
You always hear about the person who paid 10,000 Bitcoin for a couple of pizzas. What about the person on the other side of that transaction?

Those coins are now worth almost $400 million.
nodes.author: Michael Batnick

localize.full_text:
你总是听说有人花了1万比特币买了几个披萨。那交易的另一方的人呢？

这些币现在价值近4亿美元。

你總是聽說有人花了1萬比特幣買了幾個披薩。那交易的另一方的人呢？

這些幣現在價值近4億美元。

Large stocks are trading like penny stocks.

Its market cap just passed FedEx.
